community.name: Data Science
community.description: The Data Science Community is the primary community for the Data Den, the parent for many data science collections.

community.name: Zymurgy
community.description: The Zymurgy Community contains collections of concern to brewmeisters and the science of making beer.

community.name: Library
community.description: The Library Community contains collections of material held and or curated by the UCLA Library.

community.name: VSim
community.description: The VSim community is a repository and archive to facilitate peer review and dissemination of academically generated 3D content. Collections in this community deliver 3D content in a standardized file format for desktop use, allow for the aggregation of multi-media support material, and make academically generated 3D content available for educational use.
